text: Do you know what I was, how I lived?  You know%% what despair is; then
what despair is; then%% winter should have meaning for you.
winter should have meaning for you. I did not expect to survive,
I did not expect to survive, earth suppressing me. I didn't expect
earth suppressing me. I didn't expect%% to waken again, to feel
to waken again, to feel%% in damp earth my body
in damp earth my body%% able to respond again, remembering
able to respond again, remembering%% after so long how to open again
after so long how to open again%% in the cold light
in the cold light%% of earliest spring--
of earliest spring-- afraid, yes, but among you again
afraid, yes, but among you again%% crying yes risk joy
crying yes risk joy%% in the raw wind of the new world.
